author: dkulp
msg: [ARIES-626] Add a schema.map file that a bundle can provide to map extra
namespaces that may be required into schemas used for validation.

author: mikemccand
msg: fix a few cases where we fail to close IO if we hit exc during init

author: karthik
msg: One critical feature necessary to completely automate
production pushes is the ability to recognize when HBase has
successfully made all regions available for reads/writes (step prior to
HBCK).  Created script to display region availability status and stall
until all onlined regions are actually available.
Test Plan: - bin/hbase org.jruby.Main bin/region_status.rb wait
